Naomi Liddle

I'm Naomi and I'm the Operations Manager at SARD.

As well as keeping an eye on the accounts, I also look after HR and office management here at our base in Crystal Palace. Unlike so many companies, there's a real culture of ‘pitching in' here, and in addition to my regular tasks I know my way around the revalidation system and often jump in to help on the Live Chats or answer the phone to a medic in need of technical advice. No two days are the same, and that's part of what makes this such a dynamic and innovative company to work for.

I studied Drama at university before working in theatre facilities management and then spent several years running the head office of a cocktail bar chain before landing at SARD. Industries may differ, but the core values of customer service and integrity of product are what I look for in a workplace and SARD has these in abundance.

Like many of the team here, I have a creative side and I exercise this in my local theatre company and in front of my trusty sewing machine.
